languages.text: {n}Предположив, что тварь была разозлена раскопками, надсмотрщики усилили смены в глубинных секторах. Расчет оказался верен — тварь явилась, чтобы уничтожить нарушителей ее спокойствия, и угодила в расставленные ловушки. Раненая, она бежала.{/n}

{n}Assuming that the creature had been angered by the mining efforts, the overseers increased work shifts in remote sectors. The assumption proved to be correct: the beast came to destroy those who had disturbed its rest and walked right into the traps laid out for it. Wounded, it fled.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Предположив, что тварь была разозлена раскопками, надсмотрщики усилили смены в глубинных секторах. Расчет оказался верен — тварь явилась, чтобы уничтожить нарушителей ее спокойствия, и угодила в расставленные ловушки. Раненая, она бежала.{/n}

The assumption proved to be correct: the beast came to destroy those who had disturbed its rest and walked right into the traps laid for it. Wounded, it fled.{/n}

languages.text: {n}看守们认为这只生物会被采矿行为激怒了，于是增加了偏远地区的工作班次。看守的假设是正确的，那只怪物怒不可遏，打算消灭那些打扰它休息的人，却径直落入了它设置的陷阱。它受了伤，落荒而逃。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Assuming that the creature had been angered by the mining efforts, the overseers increased work shifts in remote sectors. The assumption proved to be correct: the beast came to destroy those who had disturbed its rest and walked right into the traps laid out for it. Wounded, it fled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}看守们认为这只生物会被采矿行为激怒了，于是增加了偏远地区的工作班次。看守的假设是正确的，那只怪物怒不可遏，打算消灭那些打扰它休息的人，却径直落入了它设置的陷阱。它受了伤，落荒而逃。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Asumiendo que la criatura se había enfadado por los esfuerzos mineros, los vigilantes aumentaron los turnos de trabajo en sectores remotos. La suposición resultó ser correcta: la bestia vino a destruir a quienes habían perturbado su descanso y cayó directamente en las trampas que le habían tendido. Herida, huyó.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Assuming that the creature had been angered by the mining efforts, the overseers increased work shifts in remote sectors. The assumption proved to be correct: the beast came to destroy those who had disturbed its rest and walked right into the traps laid out for it. Wounded, it fled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Asumiendo que la criatura se había enfadado por los esfuerzos mineros, los vigilantes aumentaron los turnos de trabajo en sectores remotos. La suposición resultó ser correcta: la bestia vino a destruir a quienes habían perturbado su descanso y cayó directamente en las trampas que le habían tendido. Herida, huyó.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この生物は鉱山での作業に怒りを覚えたのだろうと推測し、監督者たちは遠隔地での作業シフトを増やした。その推測は正しいことが分かった。野獣はその安息を邪魔する者たちを滅ぼすためにやってきて、仕掛けられた罠にまんまとはまってしまった。やつは怪我を負い逃げ出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Assuming that the creature had been angered by the mining efforts, the overseers increased work shifts in remote sectors. The assumption proved to be correct: the beast came to destroy those who had disturbed its rest and walked right into the traps laid out for it. Wounded, it fled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この生物は鉱山での作業に怒りを覚えたのだろうと推測し、監督者たちは遠隔地での作業シフトを増やした。その推測は正しいことが分かった。野獣はその安息を邪魔する者たちを滅ぼすためにやってきて、仕掛けられた罠にまんまとはまってしまった。やつは怪我を負い逃げ出した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Supposant que la créature est irritée par les opérations minières, les contremaîtres augmentent la cadence de production dans des secteurs éloignés. La supposition se révèle correcte : le monstre vient pour éliminer ceux qui perturbent son repos, et il tombe dans les pièges qui l'attendent. Blessé, il prend la fuite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Assuming that the creature had been angered by the mining efforts, the overseers increased work shifts in remote sectors. The assumption proved to be correct: the beast came to destroy those who had disturbed its rest and walked right into the traps laid out for it. Wounded, it fled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Supposant que la créature est irritée par les opérations minières, les contremaîtres augmentent la cadence de production dans des secteurs éloignés. La supposition se révèle correcte : le monstre vient pour éliminer ceux qui perturbent son repos, et il tombe dans les pièges qui l'attendent. Blessé, il prend la fuite.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In der Annahme, dass die Kreatur erzürnt wegen der Bergbauoperationen war, ließen die Aufseher in abgelegenen Sektoren mehr Schichten fahren. Die Annahme erwies sich als korrekt: Das Monster kam, um jene zu zerstören, die seinen Schlaf gestört hatten. Und es marschierte geradewegs in die ausgelegten Fallen. Es wurde verwundet und floh.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Assuming that the creature had been angered by the mining efforts, the overseers increased work shifts in remote sectors. The assumption proved to be correct: the beast came to destroy those who had disturbed its rest and walked right into the traps laid out for it. Wounded, it fled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In der Annahme, dass die Kreatur erzürnt wegen der Bergbauoperationen war, ließen die Aufseher in abgelegenen Sektoren mehr Schichten fahren. Die Annahme erwies sich als korrekt: Das Monster kam, um jene zu zerstören, die seinen Schlaf gestört hatten. Und es marschierte geradewegs in die ausgelegten Fallen. Es wurde verwundet und floh.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaratığın maden işleri sebebiyle öfkelendiğini varsayan gözetmenler, uç sektörlerdeki vardiyaları arttırdı. Haklıydılar da: Canavar, istirahatini bozanları yok etmeye geldiğinde tuzakların ortasına düşüverdi. Olay sırasında yaralanan mahluk, kaçmayı seçti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Assuming that the creature had been angered by the mining efforts, the overseers increased work shifts in remote sectors. The assumption proved to be correct: the beast came to destroy those who had disturbed its rest and walked right into the traps laid out for it. Wounded, it fled.{/n}
